data.title: Bitcoin Momentum Weakens With Support at $35K-$37K, Lightning Network Capacity
data.text: CoinDesk's Markets Managing Editor Brad Keoun and Tech Managing Editor Christie Harkin join fill-in host Lawrence Lewitinn for a look at this week's top stories moving the bitcoin markets and a look ahead into next week's major events. data.title: Bitcoin on Track to Record First Monthly Drop Since January
data.text: Bitcoin, the world's largest cryptocurrency, is closing in on yet another rough month
